entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 10:30 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
